candidates.definition: Kitchen appliances that process, prepare, or manipulate food ingredients before cooking or serving.

positive_examples: She used the blender to make a smoothie with fresh berries and yogurt.
The electric can opener quickly opened the tomato sauce can for dinner prep.
He juiced fresh oranges every morning using his electric juicer.
The food processor chopped all the vegetables for the salad in seconds.
I need to blend these ingredients into a smooth paste for the recipe.
The juicer extracted every drop of juice from the carrots and apples.
negative_examples: The microwave heated up last night's leftovers perfectly.
She preheated the oven to 350 degrees for baking cookies.
The dishwasher finished cleaning all the dinner plates.
He stored the milk in the refrigerator to keep it fresh.
The coffee maker brewed a perfect cup of espresso this morning.
The toaster popped up two golden slices of bread.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: CookingAppliances, KitchenCleaningAppliances, RefrigerationAppliances, CoffeeMakingAppliances

candidates.definition: Kitchen appliances designed to prepare hot beverages and breakfast items that accompany them

positive_examples: She programmed the coffee maker to start brewing at 6 AM every morning
The toaster popped up two perfectly golden slices for breakfast
He cleaned the coffee maker's filter after making his third pot today
The kitchen counter held a sleek espresso machine and matching toaster
She bought a new drip coffee maker to replace her broken French press
The toaster's settings allow for light, medium, or dark browning levels
negative_examples: She blended a smoothie in her high-powered blender this morning
The microwave heated up leftover pizza in just two minutes
He used the food processor to chop vegetables for dinner
The dishwasher finished its cycle and the dishes were sparkling clean
She preheated the oven to 350 degrees for baking cookies
The refrigerator's ice maker produced fresh cubes for their drinks
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: CookingAppliances, FoodProcessors, RefrigerationAppliances, CleaningAppliances

candidates.definition: Kitchen appliances that apply heat to transform raw ingredients into cooked food through various heating methods.

positive_examples: She used the pressure cooker to make tender beef stew in half the time.
The rotisserie chicken was perfectly golden from rotating slowly in the oven.
He fired up the outdoor grill to barbecue burgers for the party.
The slow cooker simmered the soup all day while she was at work.
They decided to deep fry the turkey using their new fryer appliance.
negative_examples: She stored the leftovers in the refrigerator overnight.
The dishwasher finished its cycle and the plates were sparkling clean.
He used the food processor to chop vegetables for the salad.
The coffee maker brewed a fresh pot for breakfast.
She mixed the cake batter with her stand mixer.
The microwave reheated the pizza slice quickly.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: RefrigerationAppliances, FoodProcessingAppliances, BeverageAppliances, CleaningAppliances

candidates.definition: Kitchen appliances designed to make specific food items or dishes, typically automating the entire preparation process for one particular type of food.

positive_examples: I bought a new bread machine to make fresh loaves every morning.
The ice cream maker churned for twenty minutes before the dessert was ready.
She used her pasta maker to create homemade fettuccine for dinner.
The popcorn maker filled the bowl with perfectly popped kernels.
His rice cooker automatically switches to warm mode when the rice is done.
We grilled sandwiches in the sandwich maker for a quick lunch.
negative_examples: The food processor chopped vegetables for the salad.
She heated leftovers in the microwave oven.
The stand mixer whipped cream for the cake frosting.
He grilled chicken on the outdoor barbecue grill.
The slow cooker simmered the stew all day long.
They used the blender to make a fruit smoothie.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: FoodProcessor, Microwave, StandMixer, SlowCooker, Blender
